ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter
Interface ConfigurableSession

All Superinterfaces:
Session, SessionConnectionCallback
All Known Implementing Classes:
SessionImpl
public interface ConfigurableSession
extends Session, SessionConnectionCallback

ConfigurableSession objects are returned from the session factory. They can be configured, most specifically the connection and session callback can be set.
